narration: That's right, the movement's choppy because
you see, you don't really have legs. Only pixels.
How pathetic. See them? They are watching you.

They want to eat you.
Press Enter to complain.
subtitles:
I want to eat
 a salad sandwich.

LORD.
What do you want
from me?

LORD, I surrender.
I am willing
to DIE even.
